attributes.action: change the treatments given to Myalgic Encephalopathy/Encephalomyelitis sufferer's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I suffer from m.e and feel the current treatments for suffer's like myself are outdated and wrong we need proper care and proper treatments not just exercise and therapy we know we have the illness we dont need therapy to deal with it and most of us cant exercise as it makes us worse we are ignored and we dont have regular check-ups basically if we dont make an appointment we dont get seen i want this changed.
